name: Jewel bits
description: Follow the story of Kisa and Marcin, students of Professor Nichola, that suddenly are caught up in a intense adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later Processor: Dual 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2 enabled, 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Dual 2.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2 enabled, 1024 MB Storage: 200 MB available space
